title: Random reward from Riot games?
body:
So today i logged onto league and i got a notification that said i had recieved a reward... 
I opened it and it said that i received a gift from riot games... it was a summoner icon, and it looked similar to the new "Cosmic Genesis icon"

Now I'm not complaining, but I just want to know what i got it for, if anyone knows please let me know.

replies.body:
I meeeaaaaan.....if you're that worried about it I can just take it back already xD!

Just kiiiiidding. It looks like you did get the Cosmic Ruins Icon from getting 33 kills on the the Dark Star game mode. If you already had it before the notification, it was probably just a delayed notification.
Thanks, wasn't worried, i was just curious to see what it was for.
